original_text:
Whoever trusts in his riches will fall,
    but the righteous will flourish like a green leaf.
korean_text: 자기의 재물을 의지하는 자는 패망하려니와 의인은 푸른 잎사귀 같아서 번성하리라

sentences.original_text: Whoever trusts in his riches will fall
but the righteous will flourish like a green leaf
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 의인은 푸른 잎사귀 같이 번성하리라.
